# 1950 Rutgers Queensmen football team

The 1950 Rutgers Queensmen football team represented Rutgers University in the 1950 college football season. In their ninth season under head coach Harvey Harman, the Queensemen compiled a 4â€“4 record and outscored their opponents 186 to 154.
